llm_res.rule: allowance - Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
The function `name()` should return the name of the token. This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
